statements: SELECT * FROM mobile_app_usage_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT app_id, session_start_time, time_spent_in_app FROM mobile_app_usage_data WHERE app_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, session_start_time, session_end_time FROM mobile_app_usage_data ORDER BY session_start_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, ads_clicked, promotions_viewed FROM mobile_app_usage_data WHERE ads_clicked > 5;
SELECT user_id, time_spent_in_app FROM mobile_app_usage_data WHERE time_spent_in_app BETWEEN 30 AND 60;
SELECT * FROM mobile_app_usage_data WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT app_id, session_start_time, session_end_time, time_spent_in_app FROM mobile_app_usage_data WHERE user_id = 200 AND time_spent_in_app > 60 ORDER BY session_start_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(time_spent_in_app) AS total_time_spent FROM mobile_app_usage_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_time_spent > 300;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS sessions_count FROM mobile_app_usage_data WHERE promotions_viewed > 0 GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY sessions_count DESC;
SELECT app_id, AVG(ads_clicked) AS avg_ads_clicked FROM mobile_app_usage_data GROUP BY app_id HAVING avg_ads_clicked > 1 ORDER BY avg_ads_clicked DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users WHERE gender='F';
SELECT user_id, username, location FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, location, age FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT user_id, event_type, event_details FROM app_usage WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01' AND end_time <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, age, location FROM users WHERE gender='M' AND age > 30;
SELECT username, location FROM users WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT user_id, start_time, end_time, duration FROM app_usage ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT app_id) AS num_apps_used FROM app_usage GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_apps_used > 5;
SELECT * FROM UserActivity;
SELECT user_id, app_id, time_stamp FROM UserActivity WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT app_name, developer, release_date FROM AppDetails ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, app_id, impression_time FROM AdImpressions WHERE ad_revenue > 100 ORDER BY ad_revenue DESC;
SELECT user_id, app_id, time_stamp, duration_minutes FROM UserActivity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM UserActivity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT app_id, time_stamp FROM UserActivity WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT app_name, category FROM AppDetails ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, app_id, ad_id FROM AdImpressions WHERE ad_revenue > 100.00;
SELECT MAX(ad_revenue) AS max_revenue, MIN(ad_revenue) AS min_revenue FROM AdImpressions;
SELECT * FROM app_users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM app_users WHERE age >= 25;
SELECT user_id, email FROM app_users WHERE last_login >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ad_impressions ORDER BY user_id DESC, impression_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, ad_id FROM ad_impressions WHERE impression_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM app_users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT username, email FROM app_users INNER JOIN app_sessions ON app_users.user_id = app_sessions.user_id WHERE session_duration > INTERVAL '1 hour' AND session_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM app_sessions WHERE session_duration BETWEEN INTERVAL '30 minutes' AND INTERVAL '1 hour' ORDER BY session_date DESC
SELECT user_id, ad_id, impression_date FROM ad_impressions INNER JOIN ad_clicks ON ad_impressions.impression_id = ad_clicks.impression_id WHERE click_date > '2022-01-01 12:00:00'
SELECT DISTINCT username, email FROM app_users WHERE last_login IS NOT NULL ORDER BY last_login
SELECT * FROM User;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM User ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT app_name, category FROM App WHERE platform = 'iOS';
SELECT user_id, app_id, total_usage_minutes FROM User_App_Usage WHERE total_usage_minutes > 60;
SELECT ad_name, ad_budget FROM Advertisements WHERE ad_platform = 'Google Ads' ORDER BY ad_budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM User;
SELECT username, age FROM User WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM User_App_Usage GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM User u JOIN User_App_Usage ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE ua.total_usage_minutes > 60;
SELECT DISTINCT app_name, category FROM App ORDER BY category DESC, app_name ASC;
